overview: 1. The Last Vampire 2. Raise the Dead 3. My Generation 4. I Got a Line on You 5. Cold Turkey 6. Five to One/Break On Through (to the Other Side) 7. 7 and 7 Is 8. Whole Lotta Love 9. Jeepster 10. I'm a Boy 11. School's Out/Another Brick in the Wall, Part 2 12. Billion Dollar Babies 13. Train Kept A-Rollin' 14. Brown Sugar  Hollywood Vampires at Cidade do Rock, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil on September 24, 2015.
title: Hollywood Vampires: Rock in Rio 2015
